SqlOutput.Sql: CASE WHEN $!s0s!$.customnumber1__c IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN $!s0s!$.customnumber2__c IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN $!s0s!$.customnumber3__c IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CAST(from_iso8601_date(CONCAT(CAST(CAST(FLOOR($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c) AS VARCHAR) AS VARCHAR),'-',CAST(CAST(FLOOR($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c) AS VARCHAR) AS VARCHAR),'-',CAST(CAST(FLOOR($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c) AS VARCHAR) AS VARCHAR))) AS TIMESTAMP) END
